Polygons of BOEM Regions, simplified to 5%

Source: R/data.R
ply_boemrgns_s05.Rd

Polygons describing the BOEM Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) Regions BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas Summarized to region name (key): Alaska (AK), Atlantic (ATL), Gulf of Mexico (GOM), Pacific (PAC). Simplified to 5% of original vertices for quickly plotting.

Usage

ply_boemrgns_s05

Format

ply_boemrgns_s05

A spatial features sf data frame with 4 rows and 6 columns:

boemrgn_key

key for shelf polygon containing region

boemrgn_name

name for shelf polygon containing region

geom

geometry of polygon as sf::st_geometry()

ctr_lon

centroid longitude

ctr_lat

centroid longitude

area_km2

area in square kilometers

Source

BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas
